snippet.title: Watcher of Realms | Official Teaser
snippet.description:
Get ready now for the Next-Gen Fantasy RPG, Watcher of Realms! 
Pre-register for Watcher of Realms on iOS&Googleplay: 
https://app.adjust.com/s8bh0dy_kdu6ngu?campaign=pre&adgroup=YTB&redirect_macos=https%3A%2F%2Fapps.apple.com%2Fapp%2Fid1585948508

It's time to explore the mystical continent of Tya and immerse yourself in a magical world with 100+ unique heroes! To save this chaotic land engulfed in madness, assume the role of a tactical commander with a plethora of resources at your fingers.

Bountiful Rare Summoning Crystals, EXP Bonus +100%, Diamonds, Gold, Psychic Power, Hero EXP Potions, and other amazing rewards are waiting for you to claim right after the global launch!

#Watcherofrealms
#NextgenmobileRPG
#Defendyourrealm

Follow us for the latest news:
[Official Website]: https://www.watcherofrealms.com/
[Facebook]: https://www.facebook.com/WatcherofRealms/
[Discord]: https://discord.gg/qE8JmRbDB6
[YouTube]: https://www.youtube.com/@WatcherofRealmsOfficial
[Reddit]: https://www.reddit.com/r/WatcherofRealmsGame/
